```
// generated by mBlock5 for mBot Ranger
// codes make you happy

#include <Arduino.h>
#include <Wire.h>
#include <SoftwareSerial.h>
#include <MeAuriga.h>

MeEncoderOnBoard Encoder_1(SLOT1);
MeEncoderOnBoard Encoder_2(SLOT2);
MeRGBLed rgbled_0(0, 12);
MeUltrasonicSensor ultrasonic_6(6);
MeUltrasonicSensor ultrasonic_7(7);
MeUltrasonicSensor ultrasonic_10(10);
MeLightSensor lightsensor_12(12);

float danger_zone = 0;
float error = 0;
float fix = 0;
float speed = 0;
float right_of_left = 0;
float angle_motor = 0;
float right_ultra = 0;
float count = 0;
float true_or_false = 0;
float right = 0;
float left_ultra = 0;
float int2 = 0;
float result = 0;
float front_ultra = 0;
float waiting = 0;
float _D1_81_D1_87_D0_B5_D1_82 = 0;
float front_ultra_2 = 0;

void isr_process_encoder1(void)
{
  if(digitalRead(Encoder_1.getPortB()) == 0){
    Encoder_1.pulsePosMinus();
  }else{
    Encoder_1.pulsePosPlus();
  }
}
void isr_process_encoder2(void)
{
  if(digitalRead(Encoder_2.getPortB()) == 0){
    Encoder_2.pulsePosMinus();
  }else{
    Encoder_2.pulsePosPlus();
  }
}
void move(int direction, int speed)
{
  int leftSpeed = 0;
  int rightSpeed = 0;
  if(direction == 1){
    leftSpeed = -speed;
    rightSpeed = speed;
  }else if(direction == 2){
    leftSpeed = speed;
    rightSpeed = -speed;
  }else if(direction == 3){
    leftSpeed = -speed;
    rightSpeed = -speed;
  }else if(direction == 4){
    leftSpeed = speed;
    rightSpeed = speed;
  }
  Encoder_1.setTarPWM(leftSpeed);
  Encoder_2.setTarPWM(rightSpeed);
}
void go (){
}

void _delay(float seconds) {
  if(seconds < 0.0){
    seconds = 0.0;
  }
  long endTime = millis() + seconds * 1000;
  while(millis() < endTime) _loop();
}

void setup() {
  TCCR1A = _BV(WGM10);
  TCCR1B = _BV(CS11) | _BV(WGM12);
  TCCR2A = _BV(WGM21) | _BV(WGM20);
  TCCR2B = _BV(CS21);
  attachInterrupt(Encoder_1.getIntNum(), isr_process_encoder1, RISING);
  attachInterrupt(Encoder_2.getIntNum(), isr_process_encoder2, RISING);
  rgbled_0.setpin(44);
  rgbled_0.fillPixelsBak(0, 2, 1);
  Encoder_2.setPulse(9);
  Encoder_2.setRatio(39.267);
  Encoder_2.setPosPid(1.8,0,1.2);
  Encoder_2.setSpeedPid(0.18,0,0);
  randomSeed((unsigned long)(lightsensor_12.read() * 123456));
  true_or_false = 0;
  int2 = 0;
  fix = 0;
  waiting = 0;
  error = 0;
  result = 0;
  count = 0;
  angle_motor = 0;
  while(1) {

      Encoder_1.setTarPWM(-1 * 30/100.0*255);
      Encoder_2.setTarPWM(0/100.0*255);

      rgbled_0.setColor(0,0,0,0);
      rgbled_0.show();
      left_ultra = ultrasonic_6.distanceCm();
      angle_motor = Encoder_2.getCurPos();
      error = ((round(ultrasonic_6.distanceCm()) - round(ultrasonic_7.distanceCm())));
      right_ultra = ultrasonic_7.distanceCm();
      front_ultra = ultrasonic_10.distanceCm();
      int2 = ((error - angle_motor));
      fix = ((int2 - fix));
      result = ((((error * -2 + (int2 * 0.0001 + fix * 1))) - angle_motor));
      fix = error;
      _delay(0.0001);

      Encoder_2.move(-1*result,abs(500));
      _delay(0.001);

      Encoder_2.move(1*result,abs(500));

      _loop();
  }

}

void _loop() {
  Encoder_1.loop();
  Encoder_2.loop();
}

void loop() {
  _loop();
}
```
